components.content:
In this section, we'll ask you to:

  • agree to undertake a Green Belt review to accommodate an increase in our local housing need as a result of the NPPF (National Planning Policy Framework) changes
  • agree to collaborate with MHCLG over monitoring and evaluation requirements
  • confirm your section 151 officer, or deputy section 151 officer, is aware of this submission
